name: icy-wind
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
